definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_ticks</field><next><block type="world_entity_inrange_foreach"><value name="_placeholder"><block type="entity_iterator" deletable="false" movable="false"></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="range"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">128</field></block></value><statement name="foreach"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_nbt_logic_get"><value name="entity"><block
